products.title: Hanson Dusk Roller Blind
products.description: A lightly textured fabric made up of two tone threads, which would compliment the furnishings in any living room or bedroom. Its blackout properties provide a room with privacy and a calming environment. Available in other colours. Dim out options available in the henlow range. Hanson dusk roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
